#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
#define MOD 10000
#define N 1000
#define LL long long

LL ar[N+2]={0};

void Calculate(){
	
	ar[0]=1;
	ar[1]=1;
	
	for(int i=2;i<=N;i++){
		for(int j=0;j<i;j++){
			ar[i]+=ar[j]*ar[(i-1)-j];
		}
		ar[i]=ar[i]%MOD;
	}	
}
int main(){
	int t,n;
	cin>>t;
	
	Calculate();
	while(t--){
		cin>>n;
		cout<<ar[n-1]<<endl;
	}
}
